Execute: Enter the name of the backup who  do you want to start:
Delete: Select which bakcup you want to delete :
Create_Name: Enter the name of your backup
Create_Type: Enter the type of your backup (1 : Differential or 2 : Complete)
Create_Source: Enter the source's path of your backup
Create_Target: Enter the target's path of your backup
Error_Main: Choice no present, rewrite an another correct choice
